modName: Breast And Butt Bounce HDT DeserterX Armor Collection UNP
summary:
This is a collection of DeserterX's armors converted to HDT :)
STAY TUNED FOR MORE ARMOR UPDATES :)
descriptionHtml:
This is a collection of DeserterX's armors converted to HDT :)[size=4][i] [color=#ff0000][size=5][i][b]STAY TUNED FOR MORE ARMOR UPDATES :)[/b][/i][/size][/color]
Required
[size=4][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels System[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions                  
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton
[/url]

[/i][/size][/i][/size]Cassandra Frost Witch Outfit
[size=4][i]You can find the crafting manual inside the Midden, below College of Winterhold.
*It's on the table near the Atronach Forge along with all the materials needed to craft the outfit once. Just look around a bit.[/i][/size]
Celes Nightingale Armor
Sarethi Farm , The Rift  <--- Carry a lot of lockpicks ;D

Gwelda Dawnguard Armor
[size=4][i]A new craftable scaled light armor found under Steel category.[/i][/size]

Gwelda Little Red Riding Hood
[size=4][i]You can find the book inside Arcadia's Cauldron in Whiterun. You can find
plenty of cotton and red mountain flowers around Whiterun.
[/i][/size]
Merta Assassin Armor
Falkreath , Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary

Merta Black Rose
College of Winterhold, hall of Attainment

[color=#ff0000][size=5][i][b]
[/b][/i][/size][/color]
